name: @zthun/works.server
description: The server side package for the @zthun/works platform.
author: Anthony Bonta

scripts.docker:publish: docker push zthun/works.server:latest && docker push zthun/works.server:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:build: npm pack && docker build . -t zthun/works.server:latest -t zthun/works.server:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
